title: 2018 GMC Sierra
item_description:
2018 GMC Sierra

Seller's Confirmation: The sale of this item is subject to the seller's confirmation. 

Specifications

  • Year: 2018
  • Make: GMC
  • Model: Sierra 1500
  • VIN: 3GTU2NEC3JG284524
  • License: 2081M2
    • Registration Expiration: 4/30/2026
  • Odometer Reads: 155,506 (updated at preview 5/19)
    • (will increase after smog)
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 7200lb
  • Drive Type: AWD/4WD
  • Engine: 5.3L V8 OHV 16V
  • Body Style: Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 275/55R20
  • Deck Length: 70”
  • Deck Width: 58”
  • Wall Height: 21.5”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Other
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Black
  • Features:
    • Backup Camera
    • Bluetooth Hands-Free
    • Cruise Control
    • Heated Seats
    • Multi-Zone Climate Control
    • Navigation
    • Auxiliary Sound Port
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Security System
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Sunroof
    • Air Conditioning
    • Bed Liner

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and smog certificate will be mailed 1 week following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV. Sale pending passed smog.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
